 1/2 Kg contains boiled eggs which are marinated in a mixture of freshly ground BBK spices & layered with long grain basmati rice in the handi and slow-cooked in the sealed handi. [Available in 1/2 Kg & 1 Kg]

menu_items.name: Malamaal Murg Dum Biryani [1/2 Kg]

menu_items.name: Paneer Hyderabadi Dum Biryani [1/2 Kg]

menu_items.name: Soya Chaap Dum Biryani [1/2 Kg]
menu_items.description: [Serves 1-2] [10 pc] Tender juicy Soya Chaap chunks & [1 pc] potato, marinated in BBK signature spices, layered with premium long Basmati rice and Fresh Dum-cooked in Handi. A masterpiece that redefines Veg Biryani! Must try. [1/2kg serves 1-2]

menu_items.name: Peshawari Chole Biryani [1/2kg]
menu_items.description:
[Serves 1-2]

menu_items.name: Mutton Hyderabadi Dum Biryani [1/2 Kg] [2pcs]
menu_items.description: [2 pcs] Fresh mutton marinated in a mixture of freshly ground BBK spices & layered with long grain basmati rice in the handi and slow cooked in the handi. Each biryani order is individually cooked in hand made clay handi and served to you in the same earthenware. BBK biryani is layered, and Masala is at bottom of Handi. To enjoy authentic flavors mix it well.

menu_items.name: Chicken Ghee Roast [250 gms]
menu_items.description: Popular Bunt community dish from the Mangalore region. Chicken Ghee Roast dry has a fiery red, tangy and spicy boneless chicken with a flavor of ghee-roasted spices. An absolute delight to this traditional spicy chicken dish with a rich tradition.

menu_items.name: Mutton Galouti Kebab [6 pcs]
